statements: SELECT * FROM medical_procedures;
SELECT procedure_name, surgeon_name, date_performed FROM medical_procedures WHERE surgeon_name = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT surgeon_name, COUNT(*) AS total_procedures FROM medical_procedures GROUP BY surgeon_name;
SELECT * FROM medical_procedures WHERE patient_id = 12345 AND date_performed BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT id, procedure_name, date_performed FROM medical_procedures ORDER BY date_performed DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM medical_procedures WHERE surgeon_name = 'Dr. Smith' ORDER BY date_performed DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT procedure_name, surgeon_name FROM medical_procedures WHERE patient_id = 1002 ORDER BY procedure_name ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS procedure_count, surgeon_name FROM medical_procedures GROUP BY surgeon_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 3
SELECT AVG(CAST(patient_id AS FLOAT)) AS avg_patient_id, surgeon_name FROM medical_procedures GROUP BY surgeon_name ORDER BY avg_patient_id DESC
SELECT * FROM medical_procedures WHERE date_performed BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY surgeon_name, date_performed DESC
SELECT * FROM medical_procedures;
SELECT patient_id, procedure_name FROM medical_procedures WHERE date_performed > '2022-01-01';
SELECT surgery_name, surgeon_name FROM surgeries WHERE operation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, procedure_name, date_performed FROM medical_procedures ORDER BY date_performed DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, surgery_name, operation_date FROM surgeries ORDER BY operation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM medical_procedures WHERE date_performed > '2022-01-01';
SELECT procedure_name, date_performed FROM medical_procedures WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM surgeries WHERE operation_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY operation_date DESC;
SELECT surgery_name, surgeon_name FROM surgeries WHERE patient_id = '456e89b7-e12d-34a5-a614-42667b5b7000';
SELECT * FROM medical_procedures JOIN surgeries ON medical_procedures.patient_id = surgeries.patient_id WHERE surgeries.surgeon_name = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT * FROM log_medical_procedures;
SELECT procedure_name, date_performed, physician_name FROM surgery_log ORDER BY date_performed DESC;
SELECT note_id, note, physician_name FROM medical_notes WHERE patient_id = 1001;
SELECT surgery_type, surgeon_name, date_performed FROM surgery_log WHERE surgeon_name = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT * FROM log_medical_procedures WHERE date_performed BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM log_medical_procedures WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT procedure_name, date_performed, physician_name FROM log_medical_procedures WHERE physician_name = 'Dr. Smith' ORDER BY date_performed DESC;
SELECT procedure_name, physician_name, date_performed FROM log_medical_procedures WHERE procedure_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND physician_name LIKE '%Dr.%';
SELECT * FROM surgery_log WHERE date_performed BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT MAX(surgery_id) AS max_surgery_id, MIN(surgery_id) AS min_surgery_id FROM surgery_log;
SELECT * FROM medical_procedures;
SELECT procedure_name, procedure_date FROM medical_procedures ORDER BY procedure_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM surgeries WHERE surgeon_name = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT patient_name, dob, address FROM patient_records WHERE dob > '1980-01-01' ORDER BY dob;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_procedures FROM procedure_log;
SELECT * FROM medical_procedures ORDER BY procedure_name ASC;
SELECT surgery_name, surgeon_name, surgery_date FROM surgeries WHERE surgery_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY surgery_date DESC;
SELECT procedure_name, physician_name FROM medical_procedures WHERE physician_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, dob FROM patient_records WHERE dob < '1990-01-01' ORDER BY dob DESC;

SELECT p.patient_name, pr.procedure_name, s.surgery_name FROM patient_records p, medical_procedures pr, surgeries s WHERE p.patient_id = pr.procedure_id AND pr.procedure_id = s.surgery_id ORDER BY p.patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM procedure_log;
SELECT procedure_id, procedure_name, surgeon_name FROM procedure_log ORDER BY procedure_date DESC;
SELECT procedure_name, surgeon_name, procedure_date FROM procedure_log WHERE surgeon_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM surgical_team WHERE number_of_team_members > 5;
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM surgical_team ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM procedure_log WHERE procedure_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT * FROM surgical_team WHERE team_lead = 'Dr. Smith' ORDER BY team_name DESC
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender, patient_contact FROM patient ORDER BY patient_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT procedure_id, note_text FROM procedure_notes WHERE note_author = 'Dr. Johnson' AND note_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM procedure_billing WHERE payment_status = 'Pending'
